events.message: I am reporting an accident involving my vehicle where another car collided with mine totaling the left side. Immediate help required.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after review of initial details and accident description provided by the insured.
An agent has been assigned to handle the investigation and communication regarding the auto accident claim to ensure timely processing.
The insurance company acknowledges receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle collision and will proceed with further steps.
Please provide a copy of the police report, repair estimates, and photographs of the damaged vehicle to support your claim.
All requested documents including police report, repair bills, and pictures have been submitted successfully for claim verification.
The assigned agent has started the investigation process by contacting witnesses and reviewing the accident circumstances thoroughly.
The investigation concluded that the other driver was at fault, and the damage assessment supports the claim for repairs.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the damage repair costs of your vehicle as per policy limits.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the timely processing and fair offer made for the auto accident claim settlement.
Claim approval has been confirmed following acceptance of the settlement offer with all required documentation in place.
The payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to the claimant’s account to cover vehicle repair expenses.
The auto accident claim has been formally closed after confirmation of payment and claimant’s acknowledgment.
All claim records and documents have been archived securely as part of the standard case closure procedure.
